name: pacman
description: cli extension for package management. It helps you to install/uninstall packages and to configure bundle dependencies.

flags.name: install
flags.description: Installs npm package and sets bundle dependencies

flags.name: uninstall
flags.description: Uninstalls npm package and removes bundle dependencies

flags.name: bundle
flags.description: Sets bundle section to be modified

flags.name: force
flags.description: Overwrite previously set dependencies. This applies only to dependencies of the given package!
